Class MessageWorld

  • java.lang.Object
    • javalib.funworld.World
      • me.lerichard.MessageWorld

  • public class MessageWorld
extends javalib.funworld.World
    MessageWorld displays a black screen with the appropriate text. Created by richard on 4/15/15.
